lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich allowed a late goal yesterday and settled for a 2-2 tie with visiting Bolton in the UEFA Cup group stage. Other winners were Tottenham, Everton, Panathinaikos, Villareal, Fiorentina, Spartak Moscow, Sparta Prague, Bordeaux, Zenit St. Petersburg and Helsingborg. Red Star Belgrade, the 1991 European champion, lost to Aris of Greece, 3-0.
